lead_paragraph: Mark Emmert, the N.C.A.A. president, faced more questions on Thursday about Indiana’s religious freedom law than about problems facing his organization.
snippet: Mark Emmert, the N.C.A.A. president, faced more questions on Thursday about Indiana’s religious freedom law than about problems facing his organization.
